message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"not enough; fewer than needed","sentence":"这儿少一个人。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style illustration showing a group of people standing together, but with one empty spot where a person is missing, in a misty, slightly faded cityscape background. The mood is quiet and a bit melancholic, highlighting the sense of something or someone missing.","sentence_translation":"There is one person less here."}
